com.rbmhtechnology.vind.annotations

Annotation Type Field


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
 @Documented
public @interface Field
    Field-level configuration on how the field is put into the Search-Index.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean indexed
      EXPERT: Mark this field as indexed.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of this field in the Index.
      boolean stored
      EXPERT: Mark this field as stored.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of this field in the Index. If left out, the name of the annotated Field will be used.
        Returns:
        String name of the field.
        Default:
        ""

      • indexed

        public abstract boolean indexed
        EXPERT: Mark this field as indexed. Indexed fields can be part of a query.
        Returns:
        boolean flag whether the field is indexed or not. Default true.
        Default:
        true

      • stored

        public abstract boolean stored
        EXPERT: Mark this field as stored. Stored fields can be retrieved in a query.
        Returns:
        boolean flag whether the field is stored or not. Default true.
        Default:
        true
